issue.title: [CF 1322] MP not updating as quickly as previously
issue.body:
since 7.1, the use of the [MP] dogtag is not updating as quickly as it was previously.


> Posted by CurseForge user srobins6 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1322 | Raw

comments.body:
Can confirm, Insanity amount is updating every 0.5-1 secs instead of continuously updating. Changing the update frequency interval in settings has no impact.


> Posted by CurseForge user erict

Fixed in the latest LDT-Unit: https://www.wowace.com/addons/libdogtag-unit-3-0/files/

It will included the next time TMW is packaged.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
